about.title: Why Handover?
about.text: We believe that the best websites are born from the collaboration between technical precision and creative freedom. Handover empowers developers to craft pixel-perfect structures while giving clients the autonomy to manage their brand's voice and visual identity. No more broken layouts. No more midnight calls to fix a typo. Just seamless collaboration.
